notes:
Appears during the [[Tibia's 15th Anniversary]], in a raid at a random time once a day. Before Denson Larika appears, two messages are broadcast in white text to all players:
'''"Something's a-cooking in Klaus' tavern on Nargor. The pirates are feeling watched."'''
'''"Denson Larika has started an epic pirates vs. ninjas battle in Klaus' tavern on Nargor!"'''
[[File:Tibia's 15th Anniversary! 4 Craban and Denson Larika fight!|thumb|300px|Fight with Craban at 0:18 / Fight with Denson Larika at 1:53]]
name: Denson Larika (Creature)
